1.6.1.name: wordpress/folksr
1.6.1.description:
Folksr is a social blogging widget. It helps you to keep together with your friends. Every time you post a blog with tags it gets you a list of blogs by your friends who have used similar tags. Think of it as a "see also" list that links to your friends blogs.

To use the widget you need to register at Folksr.com.
